+      "description": "Searching session output is a highly requested feature but difficult due to the current architecture of reparenting external windows (PuTTY, RDP); requires investigating a native terminal control or log-parsing approach."

-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): Searching session output is a highly requested feature but difficult due to the current architecture of reparenting external windows (PuTTY, RDP); requires investigating a native terminal control or log-parsing approach.\nApproach: Investigate feasibility of parsing active session logs or replacing the PuTTY wrapper with a native .NET SSH terminal control to enable text buffer search."
 }
